languages.text: Одна из операторов авгуров с немалым удивлением докладывает, что на поверхности планеты обнаружен экспедиционный шаттл династии фон Валанциус. Что еще более удивительно, судя по его опознавательным знакам, он приписан к вашему кораблю. Также оператор сообщает, что рядом с шаттлом обнаружен вход в некую систему тоннелей.

traits.locale_text: Одна из операторов авгуров с немалым удивлением докладывает вам, что на поверхности планеты обнаружен экспедиционный шаттл династии фон Валанциус. Что еще более удивительно, судя по его опознавательным знакам, он приписан к вашему кораблю. Также оператор сообщает, что рядом с шаттлом обнаружен вход в некую систему тоннелей.

languages.text: A puzzled augur operator reports that an expeditionary shuttle belonging to the von Valancius dynasty was detected on the planet's surface. Furthermore, according to its markings, it is assigned to your vessel. The operator also states that the entrance to a system of tunnels was spotted next to the shuttle.
languages.original_text: Одна из операторов авгуров с немалым удивлением докладывает, что на поверхности планеты обнаружен экспедиционный шаттл династии фон Валанциус. Что еще более удивительно, судя по его опознавательным знакам, он приписан к вашему кораблю. Также оператор сообщает, что рядом с шаттлом обнаружен вход в некую систему тоннелей.

traits.locale_text: A puzzled augur operator reports that on the planet's surface was detected an expeditionary shuttle belonging to the von Valancius dynasty. Furthermore, according to its markings, it is assigned to your vessel. The operator also states that the entrance to a system of tunnels was spotted next to the shuttle.

A puzzled augur operator reports that on the planet's surface was detected an expeditionary shuttle belonging to the von Valancius dynasty. Furthermore, according to its markings, it is assigned to your vessel. The operator also states that the entrance to a system of tunnels was spotted next to the shuttle.

A puzzled augur operator reports that an expeditionary shuttle belonging to the von Valancius dynasty was detected on the planet's surface. Furthermore, according to its markings, it is assigned to your vessel. The operator also states that the entrance to a system of tunnels was spotted next to the shuttle.

A puzzled augur operator reports that an expeditionary shuttle belonging to the von Valancius dynasty was detected on the planet's surface. Furthermore, according to its markings, it is assigned to your vessel. The operator also states that the entrance to a system of tunnels was spotted next to the shuttle.

A puzzled augur operator reports that an expeditionary shuttle belonging to the von Valancius dynasty was detected on the planet's surface. Furthermore, according to its markings, it is assigned to your vessel. The operator also states that the entrance to a system of tunnels was spotted next to the shuttle.

languages.text: 俄歇矩阵操作员困惑地报告，声称在行星表面发现了属于冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的远征穿梭机。此外，这艘穿梭机的标记显示它属于这艘飞船。操作员还说，穿梭机旁边发现了某种隧道系统的入口。
languages.original_text: A puzzled augur operator reports that an expeditionary shuttle belonging to the von Valancius dynasty was detected on the planet's surface. Furthermore, according to its markings, it is assigned to your vessel. The operator also states that the entrance to a system of tunnels was spotted next to the shuttle.

traits.locale_text: 扫描操作员困惑地报告，声称在行星表面发现了属于冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的远征穿梭机。此外，这艘穿梭机的标记显示它属于这艘飞船。操作员还说，穿梭机旁边发现了某种隧道系统的入口。

languages.text: 困惑したスキャナーのオペレーターが、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の遠征シャトルが惑星表面で発見されたと報告する。さらにその印により、それはあなたの船に配属されたものであることが分かる。また、オペレーターは「シャトルの隣にトンネルの入り口があった」とも言っている。
languages.original_text: A puzzled augur operator reports that an expeditionary shuttle belonging to the von Valancius dynasty was detected on the planet's surface. Furthermore, according to its markings, it is assigned to your vessel. The operator also states that the entrance to a system of tunnels was spotted next to the shuttle.

traits.locale_text: 困惑したスキャナーのオペレーターが、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の遠征シャトルが惑星表面で発見されたと報告する。さらにその印により、それはあなたの船に配属されたものであることが分かる。また、オペレーターは「シャトルの隣にトンネルの入り口があった」とも言っている。

languages.text: Un confuso operador augur informa de que se ha detectado en la superficie del planeta una lanzadera expedicionaria perteneciente a la dinastía von Valancius. Además, según sus marcas, está asignada a tu nave. El operador también afirma que la entrada a un sistema de túneles fue detectada junto a la lanzadera.
languages.original_text: A puzzled augur operator reports that an expeditionary shuttle belonging to the von Valancius dynasty was detected on the planet's surface. Furthermore, according to its markings, it is assigned to your vessel. The operator also states that the entrance to a system of tunnels was spotted next to the shuttle.

traits.locale_text: Un confuso operador augur informa de que se ha detectado en la superficie del planeta una lanzadera expedicionaria perteneciente a la dinastía von Valancius. Además, según sus marcas, está asignada a tu nave. El operador también afirma que la entrada a un sistema de túneles fue detectada junto a la lanzadera.

languages.text: Ein Mitglied der Auguren-Crew berichtet verwirrt, dass ein Expeditionsshuttle der Dynastie derer von Valancius auf der Oberfläche des Planeten entdeckt wurde. Mehr noch: Den Markierungen zufolge gehört es zu deinem Schiff. Außerdem wurde neben dem Shuttle der Eingang zu einem Tunnelsystem entdeckt.
languages.original_text: A puzzled augur operator reports that an expeditionary shuttle belonging to the von Valancius dynasty was detected on the planet's surface. Furthermore, according to its markings, it is assigned to your vessel. The operator also states that the entrance to a system of tunnels was spotted next to the shuttle.

traits.locale_text: Ein Mitglied der Augen-Crew berichtet verwirrt, dass ein Expeditionsshuttle der Dynastie derer von Valancius auf der Oberfläche des Planeten entdeckt wurde. Mehr noch: Den Markierungen zufolge gehört es zu deinem Schiff. Außerdem wurde neben dem Shuttle der Eingang zu einem Tunnelsystem entdeckt.

languages.text: Un opérateur des augures perplexe rapporte qu'une navette expéditionnaire appartenant à la dynastie von Valancius a été repérée à la surface de la planète. De plus, à en juger par sa livrée, elle fait partie de la flotte affectée à votre vaisseau. L'homme ajoute qu'elle se trouve à proximité de l'entrée d'un réseau de tunnels.
languages.original_text: A puzzled augur operator reports that an expeditionary shuttle belonging to the von Valancius dynasty was detected on the planet's surface. Furthermore, according to its markings, it is assigned to your vessel. The operator also states that the entrance to a system of tunnels was spotted next to the shuttle.

traits.locale_text: Un opérateur des augures perplexe rapporte qu'une navette expéditionnaire appartenant à la dynastie von Valancius a été repérée à la surface de la planète. De plus, à en juger par sa livrée, elle fait partie de la flotte affectée à votre vaisseau. L'homme ajoute qu'elle se trouve à proximité de l'entrée d'un réseau de tunnels.

languages.text: Şaşkın bir alamet operatörü, gezegenin yüzeyinde von Valancius hanedanlığına ait bir keşif mekiği tespit edildiğini bildiriyor. Üzerindeki işaretlere göre mekik, geminize tahsisliymiş. Operatör ayrıca mekiğin yanında bir tünel sisteminin girişinin tespit edildiğini de belirtiyor.
languages.original_text: A puzzled augur operator reports that an expeditionary shuttle belonging to the von Valancius dynasty was detected on the planet's surface. Furthermore, according to its markings, it is assigned to your vessel. The operator also states that the entrance to a system of tunnels was spotted next to the shuttle.
